titleStmt.title: The good and prosperous successe of the Parliaments forces in York-Shire against the Earle of New-Castle and his popish adherents as it was sent in a letter / from the ... Lord Fairefax ... ; with some observations of the Lords and Commons upon the said happy proceedings ...
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Ferdinando Fairfax, Baron, 1584-1648.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
